content:
### Node enhancements

* [Pipedrive node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.pipedrive.md): adds support for filters to the Organization: Get All operation.
* [Pushover node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.pushover.md): adds an HTML formatting option, and a credential test.
* [UProc node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.uproc.md): adds new tools.
